title: pizhai poruttaruLvAi
sahitya:
pizhai poruttaruLvAi iraivA piranda mudal
 Arindarindu purinda en piranda mudal (arivizhandu)


anupallavi

  puzhuvena bhava veyyilil nondEn pOdumE un shOdanaiyum ini


caraNam    unai marand-ulaga bhOgam meiyena uLam mayangi uzhanradum
 unadaDiyAr manam nOgha en nA koDiya mozhigaL pughanradum
 enadu valvinaip-payanidO uDal izhi tozhilgaL payinradum
 en sheivEn ayyakO aLavilai rAmadAsanukkirangi kanindu vem-
